credit_line: Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund
title: Design for an Oil Lamp
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and water color, gouache on tracing paper, laid down
description: The body of the lamp is a light blue porcelain vase with a central field of flowers against a white background, within a gold frame.  Base, handles, and fixture supporting the glass globe surmounting the vase, are of bronze.
name: Drawing
